page.title: 20THE CONTRIBUTORS
page.content:
The compilation, collection of data, and computer feeding for this D square were done under the supervision of Ballater Field Centre staff during July 1985. The following children volunteered to help with the project:- Sam Liddell Sophie Kyles Pauline Mitchell Scott Adams Louse Henderson
The following adults cheerfully provided text for us to use:- Patricia Fraser Mandy Hamilton Sarah MacLennan Graham McDonald
The editors, writers of further text, and overall planning were done by:-
Sheila Rapson Laura D. Liddell
